TopicTitle: Scan Sat mod does not allow me to run Science experiments.

Articles.Content:
Hey Guys, I've been wanting to get back into KSP and I've noticed something rather odd. After a few hours of playing with my installed mods, I've realized that the ScanSat mod makes me unable to preform science. I've isolated the problem down to this one mod.

I've uninstalled all other mods and just Scan Sat and I am unable to run any experiments. Installing all other mods allows the game to run fine. Right clicking on parts or going through the part selector in vessel viewer does not allow me the option to run science experiments.

Oddly, removing Science defs from Scan sat seems to solve the problem, but then I wouldn't get the science I want.

Edited September 27, 2015 by Lock-Os
What other mods do you have installed? ScanSAT alone doesn't do this. I think ScienceAlert has a similar, optional, function that integrates with ScanSAT.

Well, that's the thing. I uninstalled ALL of my other mods and just installed stock KSP and Scan Sat and I still ran into the same problem. Installed all my other mods and uninstalled Scan Sat and the game runs fine.

When I installed Scan Sat and removed the Science def file, I was able to preform science once again.
Problem solved! Removing the sciencedef file still allowed me to get the science. Go figure.
